reviews.review_msg: Wonderful prof. She is well educated in this field and a wonderful person all together. She helped me decide that I wanted to minor in first nations studies. Truly inspirational.

WORST PROF EVER! Unprofessional, unclear, rediculous expectations, no marking scheme, lets her personal opinion cloud empirical evidence, conflicting "cultural relativism" and outright Western-bashing, evades dealing with unhappy students...AVOID AT ALL COST...
